activities:
We may collect personal information from EEA/CH persons, such as name, email address, mailing address, phone number,
unique identifiers such as user name and job title, and demographic information such as education, gender, ethnicity and citizenship status. We may collect such personal information via contact form(s) on our website, comment(s) to our blog,subscriptions to our email alerts and/or newsletter, requests for printed materials, and résumés submitted via our website. We may use this information to assess the needs of businesses to determine suitable products, send requested product or
service information, respond to customer service requests, send newsletters or email alerts, send marketing communications,process job applications, respond to your questions and concerns, and improve our website and marketing efforts.
